meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 100 meters.
meanings.sent1: The race track was measured in hectometers for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The sign indicated that the next exit was one hectometer away.
meanings.sent3: The hectometer decided to take a break and stretch its 100-meter legs.
meanings.sent4: In the land of tiny creatures, a hectometer was considered a vast expanse.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a hectometer stick to demonstrate the length of the classroom.

meanings.sent1: The park was just a hectometer away from our house.
meanings.sent2: She sprinted with all her might to cover the hectometer in record time.
meanings.sent3: The ants worked together to carry the food crumb across the hectometer.
meanings.sent4: The hectometer felt like a never-ending journey under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The hectometer stretch of road seemed longer than usual in the foggy weather.
